GSP29vytrkt1u:11634_1: prāksato ghaṭasyāpayanakāle sato 'bhāvasya ghaṭasaṃyogadhvaṃsarūpatvena tasya ghaṭo
GSP29vytrkt1u:11636: pūrvaṃ ghaṭotrasya evānyatrāpanītaḥ punaratropanīta iti pratītyānyatra nīta iti pratīteriva tatpratītitvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11637: nanvastvevaṃ bhūtalaghaṭo neti dhīstatsaṃyogābhāvaviṣayeti bhavadabhimate doṣābhāvaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11638: tārkikamate bhaṭṭādimate ca syādeva doṣa ityata āha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11646: nādyaḥ / tasya tvatpakṣe ghaṭākālepi svarūpātmakapratyāsatyā tatra satvena tatpratīterdurvāratvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11650_0: nanu prācīnarītyāpi iha bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti tatsaṃyogo niṣidhyata ityupanokteḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:11651: uktaṃ ca vardhamānena“pratiyogibhedeneva pratiyogitāvacchedakabhedanāpyabhāvabhedāt saṃyuktaghaṭābhāvoyaṃ viśiṣṭāntarābhāvavadutpādavināśaśīlonya eveti”//
GSP29vytrkt1u:11655: 1 yaduktaṃ vardhamānena ghaṭāntyantābhāvasya bhūtalena saha tatsaṃyogadhvaṃsādireva sambandha iti na tadā pratītyāpattiriti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11660: tathā ca ghaṭādya 3 tyantābhāvasyāpyākāśādyatyantābhāvasyeva kevalānvayitvāpatte 4 riti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11673: viśeṣaṇe 3 tasya viśeṣyeṇa saṃsarge ca sati viśeṣye viśeṣaṇābhāvasyāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11674: na hi pratiyogini rūpe 4 pratiyogitavācchedaka 5 saṃsarge ca sati rūpasaṃsargābhāvaḥ saṃbhavī //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11675: kiñca rūpasamavāyatopi vāyo rūparāhityasvabhāvavat pratiyogimadadhikaraṇasyāpi pratiyogikāle svasmin tatpratiyogikābhāviśiṣṭapramityajanakatvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11677: samavāyaikatvena śyāmarūpasamavāyasya ghaṭe satve tadānīmevānyatra vidyamānaraktarūpasamavāyasyāpi satvāditi bhāvenāha -- raktarūpasyāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11687: pratiyogikāla ityādyuktyā na cātra tādṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ kalpyaḥ ghaṭāparasaṇāntaraṃ ghaṭābhāvapratīterityuktadoṣopāsto dhyeyaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11693: api ca yathā tava catvarīyābhāvagehasvarūpayorna pratiyogikāle sambandhatvaṃ tadābhāvāpratīteḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11695: tathā ghaṭasatvakāle vaiśiṣṭyasya satvepi na tadā tasya sambandhatvamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11697: nanu abhāvasya svāśrayeṇa nityasambandhaścet dhvaṃsasyāpi svāśrayanāśena ghaṭonmajjanaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11699: atyantābhāvasvīkāravādinā tvayā bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasya ghaṭadaśāyāṃ satopyapratīterupapādakatvena pratiyogideśānyadeśatvaṃ vā tatsaṃyogadhvaṃsādīrūpo vā sambandho netyucyate yathā,
GSP29vytrkt1u:11700: tathaivātra nityasambandhapakṣepyastu tathā ca ghaṭāpasaraṇānantaramabhāvadhīrna syāditiśaṅkāśopītyāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11703: catvaraniṣṭho yo 'bhāvaḥ yacca gṛhaṃ tayorye svarūpe tayorgrahe paṭadilakṣaṇapratiyogikāle sambandhatvaṃ nāsti yathā tathā kādācitkapratītyanyathānupapatyā prakṛtepyastītyarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11704_1: ghaṭadaśāyāmapi ghaṭābhavādhīḥ 1 syāditi maṇyādyuktaṃ bādhakaṃ nisatyedānīṃ bādhakāntarama
GSP29vytrkt1u:11707: evaṃ ca dhvaṃsarūpakāryanāśaḥ svirūpitanityasambandhayuktasvāśrayasya nāśamātreṇa kathaṃ codyate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11708: na hi viśiṣṭabuddhitvahetunā 3 viśiṣṭabhāvabuddhau siddhyan samavāyo bhavati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11722: bhāvepi jñāto ghaṭa ityādau svarūpasya sambandhatve rūpe ghaṭa ityādāvapi tathātvāpatteḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11726: tathā ca kathamevamāpādanamityata āha -- kāryanāśaṃ prati hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11736: yutasiddhatvāyutasiddhatvādinā bhāvapadārtheṣu vaiṣamyaṃ cedabhāveṣvapi kāryatvākāryatvādinā vaiṣamyamiti samam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11737: nanu jñānāderghaṭena nityasambandhe sadā ghaṭaprakāśaḥ syāditi cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11738: rūpāderghaṭādinā nityasambandhe sadā ghaṭe śyāmaraktarūpādidhīprasaṅgaḥ syāditi samam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11741: kiṃ ca yathākathañcidbādhakavaśādbhāve dvairūpyaṃ cedabhāvepyuktādeva bādhakādvairūpyamastviti sā 2 mānyameveti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt1u:11747: kiñca yadi lāghavānnityasambandhikāraṇanāśaḥ kāryanāśe tantraṃ tatopi lāghavānnityasambandhināśa eva tatra tantraṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11754: na tu tadviśeṣaḥ saṃyogatvamiti samavāyasyāpi 1 nāśaḥ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11755: yadi ca samavāyarakṣarthaṃ tatra kāraṇatvādikaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ tarhi vaiśiṣṭyarakṣārthaṃ vaiśiṣṭyanyatvaviśeṣaṇamapyastu / sāmyāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11762: kāryanāśaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇanāśasyaiva prayojakatvādgauravasya cākiñcitkāratvāditi bhāvena kāryanāśaṃ prati hītyādinoktaṃ nirāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11767: kāryanāśe samavāyināśasya tantratvamanuktvā nityasambandhināśasyaiva lāghavena prayojakatvasvīkāretiprasaṅgāntaraṃ cāha -- evamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11768: lāghamanusṛtya viśeṣatyāgena sāmānyādera 3 sati kāryanāśe nityasambandhināśavat sambandhanāśe sambandhatvameva tantraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11775: kecittu samavāyikāraṇanāśasya hetutvakalpane samavāyatvaṃ na praviṣṭam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11782: kāryanāśe samavāyanāśo heturityatra kiñca samavāyatvamityādinā yadgauravamuktaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:11785_2: iti nirasyedānīṃ“mathavā 6 sambandhaviśeṣanimittakā iti sādhya“mityādinā maṇyuktamanumānāntaraṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:11794: atra ca kṣatyādau kar 1 teva lāghavādviśeṣaṇasambandhopi eka eva sidhyati /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11798: sambandhaṃ vināpi viśiṣṭabuddhau gāvāśvādāvapi tatprasaṅgāditi nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11800: hatau ca satyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇamiti maṇyuktyaiva pakṣepi tadanumatamitibhāvena satyapadam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11802: maṇau viśiṣṭabuddhaya ityeva pakṣoktāvapyatra pakṣahetudṛṣṭānteṣu viśiṣṭabuddhipadaṃ laukikapratyakṣaparamiti 3 taṭṭīkokterlaukike 4 tyādyuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11808: tāvatā samavāyasiddhiḥkuta ityata āha -- atra ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11812: sambandhanimittakā ityatra sambandhasya nimittatvaṃ kiṃ viṣayatvenātha samavāyatvena ādye guṇādisvarūpāṇāmeva kena
GSP29vytrkt1u:11815: antye tu samavāyatvaṃ nityasambandhatvaṃ tathā ca lāghavena sambandhatvenaiva hetutvamastu /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11824: tasmādabhāvādāviva guṇādāvapi dharmikalpanāta iti nyāyasāmyena svarūpameva sambandhaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11834: viṣayasya pratyakṣaṃ pratyahetutvasya prāmāṇyavāde vyutpādanācceti jñeyam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11842: tathā ca daṇḍādiviśiṣṭapratītiṃ prati saṃyoga iva guṇādiviśiṣṭapratyakṣapratītirūpamanugatakāryaṃ prati nimittatayā samavāyaḥ sidhyatīti / tanna //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11858: tādṛśaviśiṣṭabuddhitvasyopapatte 4 raprayojako heturiti bhāvena tādṛśaviśiṣṭabuddheḥ anyathāsiddhimāha -- tasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11871: abhāvapratiyoginorjñānajñeyādīnāṃ ca vivekaprakāśasya sphaṭatayā nyāyasāmyena tatra
GSP29vytrkt1u:11873: abhāvādhikaraṇayostanmate suvarṇatadupaṣṭambhakapītadravyayośca vivekaprakāśasyāsphaṭatvena nyāyasāmyena tatra samavāyāpatteśca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11876: nanu nitya 2 sambandhasambandhitvamevāyutasiddhi 3 rityato 'yāvadravyabhāviguṇakriyāvayavyādyabhiprāyeṇa viṣayāntaramāha -- bhedādeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11878: yadvādyā viṣayoktirnyoyamatarītyā dvitīyā mīmāṃsakarītyā tṛtīyāsiddhāntarītyeti 4 dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11880: evaṃ vadatā tyayā sphaṭataravivekaprakāśopetaviśiṣṭabuddhau saṃyoga ityuktaḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11884: sphuṭataravivekaprakāśarāhityasthale samavāya iti vat tādṛśaprakāśavadviśiṣṭabuddhau daṇḍītyādibuddhāviva samayogaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11894: uktaprakāśarāhityarūpasājātyasyānugatasya daṇḍītyādibuddhau satvepi tatra saṃyoganānātvavat samavāyasyāpi nānātvā 1 patterityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11895: yatvāśrayanāśajanyakāryanāśasthale kāryanāśaṃ prati samavāyirūpāśrayanāśa eva heturvācyo na tvāśrayamātranāśaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11896: tathātve kapālaniṣṭhadhaṭadhvaṃsasya kapālanāśenāpi nāśaprasaṅgena ghaṭonmajjanāpatterataḥ samavāyobhyupetya iti tanna /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11897: samavāyatvaṃ hi nityasambandhatvaṃ na tu jātiranabhyupagamāt / tathā ca
GSP29vytrkt1u:11898: lāghavātsambandhikāraṇarūpāśrayanāśa eva vā kāraṇībhūtāśrayanāśa eva vāśritakāryanāśaheturiti svīkṛtau dhvaṃsanāśāprasaktyā samavāyasyānupeyatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11899: vastutastu parimāṇavāde dhvaṃsasya bhūtalaidiniṣṭhatvena kapālanāśepi 2 tannāśāprasakteḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11908: kiñca kālasya svagatena saṅkhyāparimāṇādinā tvayāpi svarūpasambandhaḥ svīkṛta iti kiṃ tatra samavāyena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11909: yadi ca kālasya tena saha samavāyasya satvānna svarūpasambandhaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11910: tarhi kā 1 lasya ghaṭena saha saṃyogasya satvāt svarūpasambandho na sidhyet / sāmyāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11912: 2 yadvā prāguktānumāneṣu guṇādiviśiṣṭabuddhinimittasambandhatayā hi samavāyasiddhirabhimatā sā na yuktā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11916: samavāyaśca sambandho nityaḥ syādeka eva saḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11917: iti nityatve sati sambandhatvamiti yatsamavāyalakṣaṇamuktaṃ tatra sambandhatvaṃ tāvadanyathopapatticatuṣṭayena nirāha -- kiñcetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11919_1: svagatadharmairanyaiścasarvaiḥ svarūpasambandhaḥ svīkṛta iti tenaiva sambandhenaikaḥ
GSP29vytrkt1u:11919_2: kālo paricchinnaparimāṇaḥ kāla iti viśiṣṭabuddhyupapattau tatra samavāyasyāvasthityabhāvaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11928: api ca guṇāderapi tvanmate svābhāvasvajñānasvakālaiḥ saha svarūpasambandhatvaṃ tāvadasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11929: tatra guṇāderabhāvajñānādīnprati svarūpasambandhatvaṃ na pratiyogi 1 viṣayatvādinā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11933: viśeṣaṇatvaṃ ca guṇāderguṇyādāvapi 2 samamiti guṇyādāvapi guṇādeḥ svarūpasambandhatvaṃ kḷptameveti kva samavāyasyāvakāśaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11934_0: api ca ghaṭarūpasamāvāyā iti samūhālambanajñānāt rūpī ghaṭa ityādibuddhervailakṣaṇyāyāvaśyamaṅgīkāryeṇa
GSP29vytrkt1u:11934_1: rūpasya ghaṭena saha viśeṣaṇatāviśeṣaṇaiva viśiṣṭabuddhyupapattau kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11937: nanvastvevaṃ tathāpīdānīṃ ghaṭarūpamityādidhībalādghaṭe rūpādinaiva svarūpasambandhaḥ kālasya nānyenetyata āha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11938: 3 yadvā kāle guṇaviśiṣṭabuddhyupapādakasambandhatvena samavāyasiddhāvapyanyatra tathātvena siddhirastvityata āha - api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:11954: kiñca samavāyasyāpi svasambandhinā saha sambandhāṅgīkāre anavasthā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11955: tatra svarūpasambandhāṅgīkāre ca guṇādereva guṇyādinā svarūpasambandhīsti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11960_0: samūhālambanepi ghaṭatadrūpatatsamāvāyānāṃ pratītivadrūpī ghaṭa iti pratītāvapi rūpāditrayasyaiva
GSP29vytrkt1u:11960_1: bhāne 'nubhavasiddhasya tato vailakṣaṇyasyāyogena rūpādau viśeṣaṇatvādireva samūhālambane
GSP29vytrkt1u:11960_2: 1 pratītotra pratīyata iti vācyamiti tenaivopapattau kiṃ samavāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11961: etenābhāvaviśiṣṭabuddhisāmyādrūpī ghaṭa ityādibuddhāvapi samavāyasyāvasthityabhāva ityarthaḥ sūtrāṃśasya sūcitaḥ --
GSP29vytrkt1u:11974: 1.ne 'pra ityasti -i. 2.guṇapadaṃ nāsti -i. 3.'bhāva ityarthaḥ. ityantaṃ nāsti-i -mu. 4.vagatya-i. 5.svarūpeti -mu, rūpeti -i.
GSP29vytrkt1u:11983: dhūmādyanumānena hi dharmimātraṃ dharmamātraṃ vā na 1 sādhyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11992: na ca eka evetyanumānamātraṃ siddhasādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:11996: evamanyathopapatyā samavā 4 yasya svarūpameva (sya saṃbandhatvena siddhiṃ)
GSP29vytrkt1u:11999: tathātvenumānaśabdapramāṇamātroccheda iti bhāvena sudhoktaṃ vivṛṇvannāha -- kañceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12004: sa ca eka eveti // rūpī ghaṭa
GSP29vytrkt1u:12007: 1.bo-cha-ka-ga-rā. 2.na tu -ga-mu. 3.viśakalitānāṃ ityadhikaṃ-ca-ka-ga-rā. 4'vā yasya sambandhatve 'numāne' tyādirītyā paṅktirasti-a.
GSP29vytrkt1u:12016: eva sukhasyātmāntare siddhatvātsvasambandha eva kṛtisādhya iti vaktavyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12022: na ca viśiṣṭaṃ nānyatra siddhamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12024: tvanmate padārthāntaratvābhāvādghaṭostītyādivākyabodhyasya ghaṭatatsattayoḥ samavāyasyaikatvenātra tasya jñānatatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12031: 1 ata eva sudhāyāṃ samavāyaikatvanirāsa 2 prakaraṇāvasāne āgamāpahnavaśca samavāyaikye syātpadārthānāṃ tatsaṃsargāṇāṃ 3 sikatāvadviśakalitānāṃ siddhatvādityuktamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12032: samavāyo yadyupeyate tarhyasyaikatvātsiddhasyaiva sādhanamutpādanamiti prāptamityarthāntaraṃ cottarārdhasyopetya samavāyasyaikatve bādhakāntaraṃ cāha -- evamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12036: 1.tataḥ 'iti bhāvaḥ' ityevāsti 'ata eve' tyādi nāsti -i. 2.prapadaṃ nāsti -mu. 3.'sikatāvadviśakalitānāṃ iti nāsti -mu.
GSP29vytrkt1u:12040: evaṃ duḥkhāsyā 1 tmāntare satvena nivartayitumaśakyatvātsvasambandha eva nivartya iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12048: nanvātmādau rūpādisamavāyasya satvepi ghaṭādāviva rūpādinā saha viśeṣaṇatāvaśeṣābhāvādvā ---
GSP29vytrkt1u:12051: 4 siddhasyaiva nityasyaiva duḥkhādisambandhasyāvasānamityapi dhyeyamiti -- evaṃ duḥkhasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12059: yattu maṇau“nanu samavāyasyaikatve kathaṃ rūpinirūpivyavasthe“tyādinaitadena sāṃkaryamāśaṅkyādhikaraṇasvābhāvādinā samāhitaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12068: adhikaraṇasvabhāvādvā ādheyasvabhāvā 1 dvā na śaṅkara iti cet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12069: evaṃ hi taireva sarvavyavasthopapattau kiṃ vyavasthityahetunā samavāyena //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12070: kiñcaiva sarveṣāmapi vastūnāṃ sarvaiḥ saha eka eva sambandha iti vā 2 kasyāpi kenāpi saha na sambandha iti vā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12071: ādye ādhārasya vā ādheyasya vā sambandhasya vā svabhāvāt kutra cidasambandhavyavahāra ita dvitīye ādhārasya vā ādheyasya vā svabhāvātkutracitsambandhavyavahāra iti ca suvacatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12079: nanu saṃyogasyaikye ghaṭasaṃyogo naṣṭaḥ paṭasaṃyoga uptanna iti dhīḥ kathamityata āha -- nāśādīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12086: na hi sambandhanāśepi sambandhinaḥ sthitivat sambandhināśepi sambandhasthitiḥ kṛtracidṛṣṭā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12087: etenātmādiniṣṭhe samavāye rūpādipratisambandhikatvasyābhāvānna saṅkara iti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12090: etenaiva samavāyasya svābhāvataḥ ekatvepi aupādhiko bhedosti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12092: evaṃ hi rūpādiḥ saṃyogātiścaika eva bhedastvaupādhika iti syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12094: ayamanubhavo bhramostvityato bādhakābhāvāditi bhāvenāha -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12102: saṃyogādiri tyādipadena vibhāgasya vā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvādisambandhasya vā grahaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12105: upādhiśabdāt tṛtīyāsamarthājjanyagamyārthe 1 śaiṣikeṭhaki kṛte aupādhikaśabdo 2 niṣpannaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12106: aupādhikamityupādhigamyamutopādhijanyamiti kalpadvayalābhaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā ādyepi jñānaṃ pramā bhramo veti bhāvena krameṇa nirāha -- kiñjaupādhikatvamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12122: etena lāghavatarkasahakṛtena dharmigrāhakānumānena samavāyasyaikatvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca siddhamitinirastam //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12151: dvyaṇukādīnāṃ sopādānakatvasādhane kāryatvahetunāpi tatsahakṛtena nityamekaṃ upādānaṃ sidhyet /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12161: nanvevamīśvarānumānepi lāghavatarkeṇa kartraikyasiddhirna syādityata āha -- īśvareti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12163: samavāyābhāve mānābhāvedeva samavāyasiddhirastvityata āha -- samavāyābhāve tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12171: samavāyābhāve tu ayutasiddha 3 yorādhārādheyabhāvanimittakasambandhaḥ na sambandhabhinnaḥ ayutasiddhayorevānyonyaṃ sambandhatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12174: ayutasiddhau yau bhāvau avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātivyaktī viśeṣanityadravye cetyevaṃ dvandvībhūtau dvaudvau padārthau tayorityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12175: atra sambandha ityasyaiva pakṣatve svarūpasambandhena siddhasādhanaṃ atonyonyamityantam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12178_1: tena siddhasādhanavāraṇāya vā avayavāvayavinoḥ pratyekamanyena saṃyoge bādhanirāsāya vānyonyamityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12185: ata evāvayavāyavinoḥ pratyekamanyena saha saṃyoge vyibhicāravāraṇāyānyonyamityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12190: abhāvavyāvṛttamanyadena kiñcidayukasiddhatvamiti vādinaṃ prati prayogāntaramāha -- saṃyegeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12196: saṃyogabhinnaḥ sākṣātsambandhaḥ na saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatobhayabhinnaḥ sākṣātsambandhatvāt saṃyogavat,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12199: sambandha ityevoktau raktaḥ sphaṭikaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vastramityādau sphaṭikavastrasaṃyuktajapākusumakardamasambandharaktimakālimādisambandhe bādhavāraṇāya sākṣādityuktiḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12210: tathā ca saṃyogaviśeṣaṇatārūpau dvāveva sakṣātsambandhau sidhyato na tvatiriktaḥ kaścitsamavāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12229: yaccocyate -- samavāyasambandhena pūrvaṃ gatvādi jātiviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ anantaraṃ jātiviśiṣṭagakāraviṣayakaṃ savikalpakamiti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12244: nanu yadyapi nirvikalpake na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12254: 3 yadvā śrotrasannikarṣarūpeṇa samavāyasambandhena jāyamānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayakaṃ vaiśiṣṭyāviṣakaṃ jñānanirvikalpakaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12270: nāpi jāgarādyaṃ gauriti jñānaṃ janyaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ janyaviśiṣṭajñānatvāt daṇḍī puruṣa iti jñānavadityanumānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12272: daṇḍapuruṣayo 1 rubhayoryugapadindriyasannikarṣe asaṃsargāgrahe ca sati vinaiva daṇḍajñānaṃ daṇḍīti jñānotpādānubhavāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12273: tathāpi“etajjanmani prāthamikaṃ gauriti pratyakṣaṃ janyaviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ anyaviśiṣṭajñānatvādanumitivat“iti maṇyuktamanumānaṃ mānam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12280: tathā cakṣuḥ cākṣuṣanirvikalpakasavikalpakātiriktaṃ jñānajanakamityapi tvaduktaprayogābhyāṃ sādhayituṃ śakyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12302: indriyasannikṛṣṭānāṃ nityānāṃ vaidikānāṃ cārthānāṃ smṛtireva syānna tvanubhavaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12309: tadviditi // iha nirvikalpakenāpyupapatyā janmāntarīyasaṃskārodbodhakā 3 dṛṣṭakalpanānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12315: sa ca viśiṣṭajñānarūpa eva savikalpa 5 kaheturastvityāśaṅkyāha -- na ca gotvarūpeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12325_0: evaṃ ca yadviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ asati bādhake tatsāmānyayorapi sa iti nyāyena
GSP29vytrkt1u:12333: tatra vyabhicārasyaiva bādhakatvādiha ca tadabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12347: na ca vyāptyādidhīre tena vinā neti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12350: tathāpa vahnimānityādijñānaṃ prati vahnyādijñānasya na viśeṣaṇajñānatvenaiva kāraṇatā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12360: nanu sambandhino 1 rajñāne tannirūpitavyāptiśaktyordhīreva netyāśaṅkya nirāha - na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12362: astvevaṃ ko doṣa ityata āha -- tathā ca na nirvikalpaketi //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12363: tasya niṣprakārakatvena yadviśeṣanyāyenāpi viśeṣaṇatāvacchedakaprakāraṇajñānasyaiva siddhiriti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12364: evamapi nirvikalpakasiddhiriti bhāvena maṇyuktamāśaṅkyate -- nanu tatreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12376: 2 evaṃ hyanumitau karaṇaviśeṣaliṅgajñānasya hetutvādyadviśeṣayoriti nyāyena janyajñānamātre karaṇamātrajñānaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12377: tathā ca pratyakṣepi cakṣurādiviṣayakamatīndriyaṃ nirvikalpaka 3 kalpyaṃ syāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12378: api caivaṃ pratyakṣaviśiṣṭajñānaṃ prati viśeṣyajñānasyāpi hetunā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12379: saṃśayādau dharmyādi jñānasyānumityadau pakṣādijñānasya hetutvena kḷptatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12381: tatra vahnitvaviśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyasya parvate bhānādgorityādi 4 tu viśiṣṭajñānamātramityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12385: yadviśeṣayoriti nyāyena viśiṣṭajñānamātraṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12388: tathā idaṃ rajatamityādiviparītaviśiṣṭapratyakṣaviśeṣaṃ prati ca dharmijñānasyādhiṣṭhānajñānasya ca hetutvamasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12390: tathā anumitau pakṣajñānasya śābde 7 bodhe ca padārthajñānasya ca hetutvamasti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12393: 1.tve viśiṣṭajñānamātraṃ prati viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetu ityadhikam - ca-ka-ga-rā. 2.na ityadhikaṃ-ga. 3.kaṃ ka-ga-rā. 4.dautu-i. 5.satīti-ca-cha-ga-rā.
GSP29vytrkt1u:12398: na ca iṣṭāpattiḥ daṇḍatvaviṣayake nirvikalpake sāmagrīsatvena daṇḍasyāpi svarūpeṇa bhānāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12400: kiṃ ca sāmānyapratyāsattirneti pakṣe vyāptigrahakāle anubhūto vahniḥ parvataṃ prati na viśeṣaṇam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12406: viśeṣaṇajñāna 2 syeva viśeṣaṇajñānatvena daṇḍatvaviśiṣṭasavikalpake daṇḍarūpaviśeṣyajñānasya hetutvaṃ nāniṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12408: viśeṣaṇajñānasya satvena yathā hetutvaṃ tatheti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12409: yadviśeṣanyāyenāpi na viśeṣaṇajñānatvena hetutvaṃ kalpiyituṃ śakyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12411: sāmānyapratyā 3 sattirastīti nyāyamate 4 yo dhūmavānasau vahnimāniti vyāptigrahadaśāyāṃ parvatīyavahnerapi parvataviśeṣaṇatayā bhānenoktadoṣāsaṃbhāvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12420: api ca tvayāpi ghaṭābhāvavadbhūtalamiti jñāne abhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇasya saṃyoktāvimau samavetāvimāvityādijñāne ca saṃyogasamavāyādirūpasya viśeṣaṇasya,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12425: bhūtale abhāva ityabhāvādiviśeṣyakajñānānantarameva bhūtalamabhāvavadityabhāva 3 viśeṣaṇakajñānamiti kalpena tvanyonyāśrayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12427: etenānugasya viśeṣaṇajñānasyāhetutve anugataṃ viśiṣṭajñānarūpaṃ kāryamākasmikaṃ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12431: yadbalādviśeṣaṇajñānahetutāsiddhyā nirvikalpakasiddhiriti bhāvenānekasthaleṣu vyabhicāramāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12432: yattu maṇāvetadevāśaṅkya prathamaṃ bhūtale ghaṭonāstīti buddhirityādinā samādhānamuktaṃ tadanūdya nirāha -- bhūtalebhāva ityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12435: viśiṣṭajñānaviśeṣaṇajñānayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāve siddhe hi vyabhicārasya gatyantarakalpanaṃ siddhe ca tasya gatyantare tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt1u:12444: tadā jñānasāmānyasāmagrīta eva viśiṣṭajñānotpattau sarvamapi jñānaṃ savikalpakaṃ syāditi bhayena viśeṣasāmagrī kalpyeta /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12459: nanu nirvakalpakasyātīndriyatvādeva nānubhava ityata āha -- anyatheti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12466: etenaiva vyabhicāreṇa rūpyādismṛterbhrame viśeṣaṇajñānatvena kāraṇatvaṃ kḷptamatonyatrāpi viśiṣṭajñāne tatkaraṇamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12468: bhramaṃ prati viśeṣyajñānasyāpihetutāyāḥ kḷptatvena anyatrāpi viśiṣṭajñāne tasyāpi hetutvāpatteśca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12469: nanu -- viśeṣañjñānasyājanakatve kathaṃ viśeṣaṇasyaiva prakāratvamiti niyamaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12493: kiṃ ca phalībhūtajñāne yadviśeṣaṇajñāne yadviśeṣaṇatvena bhāsate tadviṣayakajñānena janyaṃ yajjñānaṃ 1 tattatprakārakamiti vā niyamaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12504: tvaduktarītyā bhūtalaṃ ghaṭābhāva ityabhāvaviśeṣyakajñānasya prāthamikatveṣyabhāvatvasya tatrājñātatasyaiva prakāratvāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12505: bhāvasthala evāyaṃ niyama ityuktāvapīmau saṃyuktau ityādāvabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12506: nanu tarhi gotvāderiva prakāratvaniyamo kiṃ bījamityatastatparamukhenaiva vācayituṃ paroktaṃ viśiṣṭadhīhetudhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ prakāratvaṃ vikalpya nirāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12519: uktena 1 vyabhicāreṇaiva viśiṣṭajñānaṃ sambandhaviṣayakaṃ sambandhajñāne ca sambandhijñānaṃ hetuḥ sambandhi ca viśeṣaṇamiti nirastam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12520: sambandhinoryugapadindriyasannikarṣe tayorasaṃsargāgrahe ca tābhyāṃ sahaivendriyasannikṛṣṭasambandhasyāpi dhīrityuktatvācca //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12522: sambandhaḥ sambandhinau vinā na bhāti tau tu tena vināpi bhāta iti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12523: kiñca viśeṣyasyāpi sambandhitvena tajjñānasyāpi hetutā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12524: na ca viśeṣyasya sambandhitvepi na 2 pratiyogitvaṃ kiṃ tu viśeṣaṇasyaiveti tajjñānameva heturiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12528: abhāvavadbhītalamityādau sambandhino 'bhāvāderajñānepi viśiṣṭajñānodayena na tasya hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12534: ayaṃ bhadau vastusvabhāva kṛta iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12535: viśeṣaṇasya pratiyogitvāttannimittaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānasya viśiṣṭajñānahetutvaṃ cettadā doṣamāha -- abhāvādibuddhāviveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12542: kiñcāstu viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ 1 tathāpi na nirvikalpakasiddhiḥ / tathā hi / na
GSP29vytrkt1u:12545: na ca tatrāpi pūrvānubhavo viśeṣaṇajñānatayā saṃskāradvārā heturiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12547: yajjātīyasya yaṃ 3 janayitveva yajjanātīyajanakatvaṃ sa eva hi tatra 4 vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12553: cakṣurādīndriyajātīyasya sannikarṣaṃ janayatvaiva cākṣuṣādisākṣātkārajātīyajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti sannikarṣa evendriyasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12554: tathā daṇḍajātīyasya cakrabhramaṃ janayitvaiva ghaṭajātīyajanakatvamiti bhramiḥ daṇḍasya vyāpāro dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12558: nanvastvevaṃ vyāpāratvaṃ tādṛśamapi saṃskārasyāstvityata āha -- na cātreti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12562: nanu viśiṣṭajñānasyoktavidhayā kāryatāvacchedakatvepi nirvikalpakāsiddhiḥ kuta ityata āha -- tathāceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12568: nanu smaraṇasya viśeṣaṇajñāna 1 janyatvādanavasthetyata āha -- janyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12571: smṛtivyāvṛttameva kāryatāvacchedakaṃ svayamupapādya smṛtisādhāraṇameva kāryatāvaccedakamastviti matāntaramāha -- keci 3 diti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12582: prathamapravṛttena pramāṇena lāghavasahakāriṇā janyajñānaparamparāyāmeva viśeṣaṇajñānasya kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12584: na ca janyasya sarvasyāpi jñānasya viśeṣaṇajñānyatve pūrvapūrvajñānadhārāyā avicchede prāyaṇādyanupapatyā jñānānavasthādoṣaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12587: tatrāpi 3 pūrvajanmāntararīyānubhava iti svīkāre 4 ṇāviralalagrajñānadhārāyā abhāvena prāyaṇādyupapatteḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12588: na ca puruṣa 5 prayojyaśabdavṛttijātiviśiṣṭapratyakṣe viśeṣaṇajñānaṃ na smṛtirūpaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12617: kiñcātīndriya 2 jñānopagame yogyānupalabdherabhāvena jñānābhāvasya niścetumaśakyatayā anupalabdhiliṅgajanyā ghaṭādyabhāvadhīrna
GSP29vytrkt1u:12620: nirvikalpeke sādhakābhāvamātraṃ na bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha -- kiñceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12629: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva nirvikalpakābhāve liṅgam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12630: nirvikalpake sati savikalpakāvaśyaṃbhāvābhāvena nirvikalpakaṃ prati savikalpakasyā vyāpakatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12631: api ca nirvikalpakajanyasavikalpakotpattidaśāyā 1 matī 2 ndriyanirvakalpakasāmagrīsatvena satpratipakṣavatsāmagrīdvayasya parasparapratibandhakamapi jñānaṃ notpadyata //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12633_1: parāmarśena gṛhyamāṇo ghaṭādyabhāvotra ghaṭo nāsti yogyatve satyanupalabhyamānatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt1u:12635: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva ghaṭādyabhāvabuddhau liṅgamastu savikalpakasya yogyatayā tadabhāvajñānasaṃbhavāditi vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12639: savikalpakasya nirvikalpavyāpakatayā savikalpakābhāvasyaiva tatra liṅgatvāttacasya ca prataykṣādityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12643: savikalpakadaśāyāṃ nirvikalpakasāmagryeva nāsti nirvikalpakābhāvasahakṛtendriyasaṃyogādereva nirvikalpakasāmagrītvādevaṃ ca noktadoṣa iti bhāvenāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca pūrveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12645: 1.itaḥ ' na ca pūrva' ityantaṃ nāsti. atra 'mapi indriya sannikarṣarūpa' ityasti -cha-ga. 2.mapīndriyasannikarṣarūpanirvi -ka-mu-rā.
GSP29vytrkt1u:12652: na ca samūhālambana 1 vat sāmagryā 2 dārthasamājādekaṃ jñānamastīti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12654: na hi saṃbhavatyevameva jñānamekasminneva ghaṭe ghaṭatvaprakārakaṃ tada 3 prakārakaṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12655: api ca daṇḍapuru 4 ṣobhayasannikarṣe sati daṇḍadaṇḍatvobhayanirvikalpakānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭa 5 puruṣadhīḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12658: tattandriyasannikarṣarūpānekasāmagrīsatvepi anekagocaramekaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate na tu pratibandha evamastvityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12660: nanu smṛtisāmagrītonubhavasāmagryā ivānumitisāmagrītaḥ pratyakṣasamāmagryā iva ca nirvikalpakasyaivotpattirityastvityato doṣāntaramāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12671: na hi daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭapuruṣajñānamanubhūyate /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12676: kiñca daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣe 1 tadubhayasvarūpamātraviṣayakanirvikalpakavat sambandhasyāpi sannikarṣe 2 tatsvarūpamātraviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakamapi kasmānna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt1u:12681: muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭajñānotpattivelāyāṃ daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyamapi daṇḍe bhātyevetitvanmata 4 vannyāyamate 5 viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyadhīrastvityata āha -- kiñca daṇḍapuruṣeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12695: api cāsya nirvikalpakajatīyasya jñānakāryaṃ vyāvahāraṃ saṃskāraṃ icchādikaṃ ca kadāpyajanayato na jñānatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12696: natarāṃ cāsya svaṣaye kadāpi saṃśayādyavirodhino niścayatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12698: na ca nirvikalpakena kasyacidapi vastutaḥ kadāpi siddhirdṛṣṭā /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12700: api caivaṃ nirvikalpakajñānaṃ pratyakṣaviśeṣavat anumitiviśeṣopi syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12703: kvacitkāryājananepi nirvikalpakāntare jñānakāryabalāt nirvikalpakamātre jñānatvādikamaviruddhamityato 'syetyasya vivaraṇaṃ nirvikalpakajātīyasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12706: nanvīśvarajñānamiva nirvikalpakamapi pramābhramavijātīyajñānamanitya 2 mityata āha -- na ceti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12707: tathātve ghaṭādirapi kuto na jñānaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12708: yadapi“pratyakṣaṃ dvividhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ savikalpakaṃ ce“ti maṇyādau pratyakṣa 3 tvakathanaṃ tadapyayuktamityāha -- api caivamiti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12715: nirvikalpakābhāve tu jñānatvāśrayo na savikalpakatvāvacchinnibhinnaḥ jñānatvāt daṇḍīti jñānavat,
GSP29vytrkt1u:12719: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ paddhatau“dravyādivikalpānāṃ prathamamevotpattau bādhakābhāvena 4 nirvikalpakā 5 nupapatteḥ“iti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:12721: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ ca nirvikalpakamiti bhāvenāha -- nirvikalpakābhāve tviti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:12734_1: pūrvamabhāne viśiṣṭajñāne prakāratvānupapattirūpasya sambandhijñānaṃ vinā sambandhajñānānupapatyādirūpasya
